thread.title: 23 Reasons Why Every Kid Should Grow Up With A Dog
thread.title_full: 23 Reasons Why Every Kid Should Grow Up With A Dog

author: Arielle Calderon
title: 23 Reasons Why Every Kid Should Grow Up With A Dog
text:
View this image ›
adriennec4219c9fd5 / Via buzzfeed.com ID: 10345742 2. They’ll play dress-up with you when you want to go trick-or-treating. View this image ›
Jennifer Riley Williams ID: 10345761 3. Have secret meetings with you when you need someone to talk to. Ashley Ramos, Erin Burt Spergel, irishcowgirl / Via buzzfeed.com ID: 10345744 4. Or even volunteer to help fulfill your hobbies. View this image ›
ashleybarrettu / Via buzzfeed.com ID: 10345745 5. Dogs don’t mind lazy Sundays. View this image ›
coconut0501 / Via buzzfeed.com ID: 10345746 6. They’re always down to binge-watch TV with you. View this image ›
Ashley Panossian ID: 10345743 7. And they love movie marathons just as much as anyone else. Jonelle Potter/BuzzFeed ID: 10345768 8. Dogs are always there to comfort you. View this image ›
Elin A. Frodin Greenberg ID: 10345748 9. Whether it’s because you’re tired… Samantha Reed, Madisen McDonley, skyw48194752d / Via buzzfeed.com ID: 10345790 10. Or just in need of a hug… View this image ›
Rylie Wahl ID: 10345789 11. They’ll always be there for support. View this image ›
Jay Sanders ID: 10345759 12. Dogs are there during many stages of your life. View this image ›
kerir43c6924d0 / Via buzzfeed.com ID: 10345779 13. They’re by your side for all the adventures. stephanieu4bae54329 / Via buzzfeed.com , Yoli Khuu ID: 10345792 14. All of the weekend strolls… View this image ›
Kristen Berry-delaRosa ID: 10345782 15. And all of the fun. View this image ›
Gabrielle Rubin / BuzzFeed ID: 10345752 16. Dogs make you laugh. View this image ›
Erin Burt Spergel ID: 10345749 17. They make you smile. View this image ›
Karen Roach ID: 10345776 18. And they always make your days brighter. View this image ›
Vero Sacco ID: 10345795 19. Dogs teach us about unconditional love… View this image ›
j4674d05a7 / Via buzzfeed.com ID: 10345755 20. Loyalty that lasts a lifetime… View this image ›
Laura Potesta ID: 10345783 21. And the special bond of true friendship. View this image ›
Jenny Cryderman ID: 10345762 22. Dogs are basically the big brother/sister you’ve always dreamed of. View this image ›
mkdoar / Via buzzfeed.com ID: 10345785 23. And nothing can compete with the connection between a kid and their dog. View this image ›
Rita Tortora ID: 10345788 View this image ›
Tiffany Marie ID: 10345794 Want to be featured in similar BuzzFeed posts? Follow the BuzzFeed Community on Facebook and Twitter ! ID: 10348614 Check out more articles on BuzzFeed.com!
